product_name: The North Face Ampere Dual Shorts - Men's
long_description: A relaxed pair of running shorts with a supportive mesh liner, The North Face Ampere Dual Shorts for men are built for comfort during the long haul. Polyester with a dash of elastane creates soft and flowing outer shorts; mesh panels add to their breathability. FlashDry(TM) fibers in liners dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Includes hand pockets and an internal drawcord. The North Face Ampere Dual Shorts for men are engineered to move with you during the run and feature a 9 in. inseam.
short_description: A relaxed pair of running shorts with a supportive mesh liner, The North Face Ampere Dual Shorts for men are built for comfort during the long haul.
